name: Periodic Pirates
description:
In Periodic Pirates, you are a space traveler and courier trading elements across the galaxy.  Different planets will have different desired deals - some less than legal.  Planetary representatives who wish to purchase illegal elements will pay top dollar, but the risk associated with this sort of business will stack over time.

Keep an eye on your inventory.  These elements are volatile and will deteriorate over time.  Even worse, clusters of these elements will speed their deterioration - so large stacks of an element will deteriorate faster than small amounts.

Can you make enough money to pay off the intergalactic mafia before they track you down?  Get trading, courier, and find out.
